queryText: (@P0 nvarchar(?))SELECT * FROM openidmv.ManagedUser WHERE objectid = @P0

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 nvarchar(?),@P3 nvarchar(?))SELECT obj.* FROM openidmv.relationships obj INNER JOIN openidmv.relationshipproperties firstId ON (firstId.relationships_id = obj.id AND firstId.propkey = ? AND firstId.propvalue = @P0) INNER JOIN openidmv.relationshipproperties firstPropertyName ON (firstPropertyName.relationships_id = obj.id AND firstPropertyName.propkey = ? AND firstPropertyName.propvalue = @P1) UNION ALL SELECT obj.* FROM openidmv.relationships obj INNER JOIN openidmv.relationshipproperties secondId ON (secondId.relationships_id = obj.id AND secondId.propkey = ? AND secondId.propvalue = @P2) INNER JOIN openidmv.relationshipproperties secondPropertyName ON (secondPropertyName.relationships_id = obj.id AND secondPropertyName.propkey = ? AND secondPropertyName.propvalue = @P3)

name: sp_trace_getdata

queryText:
SELECT DB_NAME(dbid) as DBName FROM sys.sysdatabases;
SELECT DB_NAME(dbid) as DBName, COUNT(dbid) as NConnections
from sys.sysprocesses as sp
inner join sys.dm_exec_connections as ex
on sp.spid = ex.session_id
WHERE dbid > ?
GROUP BY dbid;

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 nvarchar(?))WITH results AS ( SELECT rowNo = ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY objectid DESC ), openidmv.links.* FROM openidmv.links WHERE (linktype = @P0 AND linkqualifier = @P1 AND secondid = @P2)) SELECT * FROM results WHERE rowNo BETWEEN ? AND ?

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 nvarchar(?),@P3 nvarchar(?),@P4 nvarchar(?),@P5 nvarchar(?))select publishreq0_.PUBLISHING_JOB_ID as PUBLISHI1_8_, publishreq0_.PARENT_PUBLISHING_JOB_ID as PARENT3_8_, publishreq0_.STATE as STATE4_8_, publishreq0_.MESSAGE as MESSAGE5_8_, publishreq0_.CREATED_DATE as CREATED6_8_, publishreq0_.STARTED_DATE as STARTED7_8_, publishreq0_.FINISHED_DATE as FINISHED8_8_, publishreq0_.UUID as UUID9_8_, publishreq0_.TARGET_REPOSITORY as TARGET10_8_, publishreq0_.ROOT_WORKPACKAGE_ID as ROOT11_8_, publishreq0_.PUBLISH_RESULT_ID as PUBLISH12_8_, publishreq0_.PUBLISH_REQUEST_ID as PUBLISH18_8_ from TB_PUBLISHING_JOBS publishreq0_ cross join TB_PUBLISHING_JOBS publishing1_ cross join TB_HOSTS host2_ cross join TB_WORK_PACKAGES workpackag3_ where publishreq0_.discriminator=? and publishreq0_.PARENT_PUBLISHING_JOB_ID=publishing1_.PUBLISHING_JOB_ID and publishing1_.HOST_ID=host2_.HOST_ID and publishreq0_.ROOT_WORKPACKAGE_ID=workpackag3_.WORKPACKAGE_ID and (publishreq0_.STATE in (@P0 , @P1 , @P2 , @P3)) and host2_.NAME=@P4 and workpackag3_.STATE<>@P5

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 nvarchar(?))WITH results AS ( SELECT rowNo = ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY objectid DESC ), openidmv.links.* FROM openidmv.links WHERE (linktype = @P0 AND linkqualifier = @P1 AND firstid = @P2)) SELECT * FROM results WHERE rowNo BETWEEN ? AND ?

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?))WITH results AS ( SELECT rowNo = ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY obj.id DESC), obj.fullobject FROM openidmv.managedobjects obj INNER JOIN openidmv.objecttypes objecttypes ON (obj.objecttypes_id = objecttypes.id AND objecttypes.objecttype = @P0) LEFT OUTER JOIN openidmv.managedobjectproperties prop1 ON (prop1.managedobjects_id = obj.id AND prop1.propkey = @P1) WHERE prop1.propvalue IS NOT NULL) SELECT * FROM results WHERE rowNo BETWEEN ? AND ?

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 nvarchar(?),@P3 nvarchar(?),@P4 nvarchar(?),@P5 nvarchar(?),@P6 nvarchar(?))select publishing0_.PUBLISHING_JOB_ID as PUBLISHI1_8_, publishing0_.PARENT_PUBLISHING_JOB_ID as PARENT3_8_, publishing0_.STATE as STATE4_8_, publishing0_.MESSAGE as MESSAGE5_8_, publishing0_.CREATED_DATE as CREATED6_8_, publishing0_.STARTED_DATE as STARTED7_8_, publishing0_.FINISHED_DATE as FINISHED8_8_, publishing0_.UUID as UUID9_8_, publishing0_.TARGET_REPOSITORY as TARGET10_8_, publishing0_.ROOT_WORKPACKAGE_ID as ROOT11_8_, publishing0_.PUBLISH_RESULT_ID as PUBLISH12_8_, publishing0_.TARGET_PORTAL as TARGET13_8_, publishing0_.TARGET_PORTAL_SERVER_ID as TARGET14_8_, publishing0_.HOST_ID as HOST15_8_, publishing0_.ORCHESTRATOR_REQUIRES_APPROVAL as ORCHEST16_8_, publishing0_.UPDATE_PUBLISH_STATES as UPDATE17_8_ from TB_PUBLISHING_JOBS publishing0_ cross join TB_WORK_PACKAGES workpackag1_ cross join TB_HOSTS host3_ where publishing0_.discriminator=? and publishing0_.ROOT_WORKPACKAGE_ID=workpackag1_.WORKPACKAGE_ID and publishing0_.HOST_ID=host3_.HOST_ID and (publishing0_.STATE=@P0 or publishing0_.STATE=@P1 or publishing0_.STATE=@P2 or publishing0_.STATE=@P3) and (workpackag1_.STATE=@P4 or workpackag1_.STATE=@P5) and host3_.NAME=@P6

/* 
  -- SoSSE 30.0.0.9776
-- File - Procedure\sqlserver_spotlight\2008 R2 SP1\QS_VirtualFileStats.sql
-- *
-- * Copyright 2018 Quest Software Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
-- *
 
*/
use tempdb
SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY -?
set lock_timeout ?
declare @server_start_time_utc datetime
select @server_start_time_utc = create_date from sys.databases where name = N?
declare @Quest_fn_virtualfilestats table
( DbId smallint
, FileId smallint
, NumberReads bigint
, NumberWrites bigint
, BytesRead bigint
, BytesWritten bigint
, BytesOnDisk bigint
, IOStallMS bigint
, IOStallReadMS bigint
, IOStallWriteMS bigint
, sample_ms bigint
)
begin try
insert into @Quest_fn_virtualfilestats
(DbId, FileId, NumberReads, NumberWrites, BytesRead, BytesWritten, BytesOnDisk, IOStallMS, IOStallReadMS, IOStallWriteMS,sample_ms)
select database_id
, file_id
, num_of_reads
, num_of_writes
, num_of_bytes_read
, num_of_bytes_written
, size_on_disk_bytes
, io_stall
, io_stall_read_ms
, io_stall_write_ms
, sample_ms
from sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null,null) -- null,null is all dbs all files.
end try
begin catch
-- if we got no rows, then stop processing.
end catch
declare @Quest_sysfiles table
( [dbid] smallint
, [FileName] nvarchar(?) NULL
, [LogicalFileName] nvarchar(?) NULL
, [FileID] int
, [GroupID] smallint
, [GroupName] sysname
, [TypeDesc] nvarchar(?)
)
declare @nrows int
declare @Quest_dbList table
( id smallint identity
, dbid smallint
)
insert into @Quest_dbList (dbid)
select database_id from sys.databases with (nolock)
where user_access <> ? and has_dbaccess(name) <> ? and state = ? and is_auto_close_on = ?
set @nrows = @@rowcount
declare @id smallint
declare @dbid smallint
declare @sql nvarchar(?)
set @id = ?
while @id <= @nrows
begin
select @dbid = dbid from @Quest_dbList where id = @id
if @@rowcount = ? or @dbid is null
break
set @id = @id + ?
set @sql = N?+quotename(db_name(@dbid)) + ?
+ N?
+ N?
+ N?
begin try
insert into @Quest_sysfiles
(dbid, FileName, LogicalFileName, FileID, GroupID, GroupName, TypeDesc)
exec(@sql)
end try
begin catch
DECLARE
@ErrorMessage NVARCHAR(?),
@ErrorNumber INT,
@ErrorSeverity INT,
@ErrorState INT,
@ErrorLine INT,
@ErrorProcedure NVARCHAR(?);
SELECT
@ErrorNumber = ERROR_NUMBER(),
@ErrorSeverity = ERROR_SEVERITY(),
@ErrorState = ERROR_STATE(),
@ErrorLine = ERROR_LINE(),
@ErrorProcedure = ISNULL(ERROR_PROCEDURE(), ?);
SELECT @ErrorMessage = N?+ ERROR_MESSAGE();
IF @ErrorNumber != ? and @ErrorNumber != ?
begin
set lock_timeout -?
if @ErrorSeverity > ?
RAISERROR(@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, ?, @ErrorNumber, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState, @ErrorProcedure,@ErrorLine) WITH LOG;
else
RAISERROR(@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, ?, @ErrorNumber, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState, @ErrorProcedure,@ErrorLine);
end
end catch
end
select db_name(sf.dbid) DBName
, sf.FileName
, sf.TypeDesc
, sf.LogicalFileName
, vf.NumberReads
, vf.NumberWrites
, vf.BytesRead
, vf.BytesWritten
, vf.BytesOnDisk
, vf.IOStallMS
, vf.IOStallReadMS
, vf.IOStallWriteMS
, sf.GroupName as FGName
, db_name(sf.dbid) + ? + sf.GroupName as DBAndFGName
, db_name(sf.dbid) + ? + sf.FileName as DBFileName
, @server_start_time_utc as instance_start_time_utc
, vf.DbId as database_id
, vf.FileId as file_id
, vf.sample_ms
, vs.volume_mount_point as MountPoint
from @Quest_sysfiles sf
join @Quest_fn_virtualfilestats vf on (sf.dbid = vf.DbId and sf.FileID = vf.FileId)
outer apply sys.dm_os_volume_stats(sf.dbid,vf.FileId) vs
order by db_name(sf.dbid), sf.FileName
IF @@TRANCOUNT > ? COMMIT TRAN
(@P0 nvarchar(?))SELECT objectid, pwd, roles FROM openidmv.internaluser WHERE objectid = @P0

(@ShowActiveSessionsOnly sysname
, @ShowSystemObjects sysname
, @maxConnections int
, @SQLLength int
, @minimumElapsedTime int)
select top(@maxConnections)
SessionKey = convert(nvarchar,s.session_id) + ? + convert(nvarchar, coalesce(r.request_id, ?)) + ? + convert(nvarchar,coalesce(r.task_address,?))
, spid = s.session_id
, RequestId = r.request_id
, SQLUser = s.login_name
, NTUser = coalesce(s.nt_user_name,?)
, NTDomain = coalesce(s.nt_domain ,?)
, status = rtrim ( case when isnull(r.blocking_session_id,?) <> ? then ? else coalesce ( r.[status] , s.[status] ) end )
, BlockedBySPID = isnull(r.blocking_session_id,?)
, CurrentCommand = isnull(r.command,?)
, DBName = case when coalesce(s.database_id,?) = ? then ? else db_name(s.database_id) end
, ProgramName = s.program_name
, CurrentWaitType = convert(nvarchar(?),r.wait_type)
, CurrentWaitTime = coalesce(r.wait_time,?)
, LastWaitType = r.last_wait_type
, LastWaitResource = convert(nvarchar(?),r.wait_resource)
, OpenTransactionCnt = r.open_transaction_count
, CPUTime = case when s.is_user_process=?
then r.cpu_time
else s.cpu_time
end
, RequestCPUTime = r.cpu_time
, Reads = s.reads
, RequestReads = r.reads
, Writes = s.writes
, RequestWrites = r.writes
, LogicalReads = s.logical_reads
, RequestLogicalReads = r.logical_reads
, MemoryUsage = s.memory_usage
, HostProcess = s.host_process_id
, HostName = s.host_name
, LoginTime = s.login_time
, LastBatchTime = s.last_request_start_time
, NetAddress = c.client_net_address
, NetLibrary = c.net_transport
, kpid = ?
, Active = case when r.request_id is not null
then N?
else N?
end
, SystemProcess = case when is_user_process = ?
then N?
else N?
end
, CurrentServerTime = getdate()
, PlanHandle = r.plan_handle
, QueryHash = r.query_hash
, SQLHandle = IsNull(r.sql_handle,c.most_recent_sql_handle)
, r.statement_start_offset
, r.statement_end_offset
, RequestStartTime = r.start_time
, RequestGrantedMemory = r.granted_query_memory
, SessionUpTime = CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(YEAR, s.login_time, GetDate()) > ? Then DATEDIFF(DAY, s.login_time, GetDate()) * ? * ? * ? else DATEDIFF(ss, s.login_time, GetDate()) end
, RequestElapsedTime = case when is_user_process = ? then NULL else case when r.total_elapsed_time < ? then datediff(ss,r.start_time,GetDate()) else r.total_elapsed_time/? end end
, Threads = (
select isnull(max(T3.ecid), ?)+?
from master.sys.sysprocesses T3
where r.session_id = T3.spid
) , ResourcePoolName = null,user_objects_alloc_page_count = NULL
,user_objects_dealloc_page_count = NULL
,internal_objects_alloc_page_count = NULL
,internal_objects_dealloc_page_count = NULL
,TempdbContentionPageID = NULL
,TempdbContentionResourceType = NULL,BatchText = NULL
,QueryText = NULL From
sys.dm_exec_sessions s with (nolock)
left join sys.dm_exec_connections c with (nolock) on c.most_recent_session_id = s.session_id and c.parent_connection_id Is Null
left outer join sys.dm_exec_requests r with (nolock) on s.session_id = r.session_id outer apply ( select top(?) dbid from master.dbo.sysprocesses m1 where s.session_id = m1.spid ) m Where (@ShowActiveSessionsOnly = N? or r.request_id is not null )
and (@ShowSystemObjects = N? or (is_user_process <> ? ) )

/* 
  30.0.0.9776 ï¿½ Copyright 2018 Quest Software Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. 
*/
use tempdb
declare @ConnectionCnt numeric
declare @BlockCnt numeric
declare @UserConnectionCnt numeric
declare @SystemConnectionCnt numeric
declare @ActiveUserConnectionCnt numeric
declare @InactiveConnectionCnt numeric
declare @ClientMachineCnt numeric
declare @MaxWorkerThreads numeric
declare @AllActiveConnectionsCnt numeric
declare @SQLUserConnectionsParm numeric
declare @SQLInternalConnectionsCnt numeric
declare @LeadBlockersCnt numeric
declare @DBCCSessionsCnt int
select @ConnectionCnt = count(distinct(s.session_id))
,@UserConnectionCnt = count(distinct
case when s.is_user_process = ? /*s.host_name is not null and s.program_name not like N'SQLAgent - %' --  ignore SQLAgent system processes*/
then s.session_id
else null
end)
,@ClientMachineCnt = count(distinct
case when s.host_name is not null and s.program_name not like N?
then s.host_name
else ?
end) - ?
, @ActiveUserConnectionCnt = count(distinct
case when /*r.session_id > 50 */ s.is_user_process = ? and r.session_id is not null
then s.session_id
else null
end)
, @AllActiveConnectionsCnt = count(distinct
case when /*(upper(r.status) =N'RUNNABLE' or r.blocking_session_id > 0 or upper(r.command) like N'WAITFOR%') */
r.session_id is not null
then s.session_id
else null
end)
, @SQLInternalConnectionsCnt = count(distinct
case when s.host_name is null
then s.session_id
else null
end) - ?
, @DBCCSessionsCnt = count(distinct
case when upper(ltrim(rtrim(r.command))) like N?
then s.session_id
else null
end)
, @BlockCnt = count(distinct case when blocking_session_id is not null and blocking_session_id>? then r.session_id else null end)
from sys.dm_exec_sessions s with (readpast)
left join sys.dm_exec_connections c on c.most_recent_session_id = s.session_id
left join sys.dm_exec_requests r on s.session_id = r.session_id
set @SystemConnectionCnt = @ConnectionCnt - @UserConnectionCnt
set @InactiveConnectionCnt = @ConnectionCnt - @AllActiveConnectionsCnt
select @MaxWorkerThreads = convert(numeric, c.value_in_use)
from sys.configurations c
where c.name = N?
select @SQLUserConnectionsParm = convert(numeric, c.value_in_use)
from sys.configurations c
where c.name = N?
if @BlockCnt > ?
begin
select @LeadBlockersCnt = count(distinct blocking_session_id) FROM sys.dm_exec_requests
where blocking_session_id is not null
and blocking_session_id > ?
and blocking_session_id not in (select session_id from sys.dm_exec_requests where blocking_session_id > ? and blocking_session_id is not null)
end
select @ConnectionCnt as N?
, @BlockCnt as N?
, @UserConnectionCnt as N?
, @SystemConnectionCnt as N?
, @ActiveUserConnectionCnt as N?
, @InactiveConnectionCnt as N?
, @ClientMachineCnt as N?
, isnull(@MaxWorkerThreads,?) as N?
, isnull(@AllActiveConnectionsCnt,?) as N?
, isnull(@SQLUserConnectionsParm,?) as N?
, isnull(@SQLInternalConnectionsCnt,?) as N?
, isnull(@LeadBlockersCnt,?) as N?
, isnull(@DBCCSessionsCnt,?) as N?
, @@connections as N?

select this_.id as id1_6_0_, this_.REPOSITORY_ID as REPOSITO2_6_0_, this_.NAME as NAME3_6_0_, this_.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIPT4_6_0_, this_.VENDOR_NAME as VENDOR5_6_0_, this_.PRODUCT_NAME as PRODUCT6_6_0_, this_.PRODUCT_VERSION as PRODUCT7_6_0_ from REPOSITORY_DEFINITION this_

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 nvarchar(?),@P3 nvarchar(?),@P4 nvarchar(?),@P5 nvarchar(?),@P6 nvarchar(?),@P7 nvarchar(?),@P8 nvarchar(?),@P9 nvarchar(?),@P10 nvarchar(?),@P11 nvarchar(?),@P12 nvarchar(?),@P13 nvarchar(?),@P14 nvarchar(?),@P15 nvarchar(?),@P16 nvarchar(?),@P17 nvarchar(?),@P18 nvarchar(?),@P19 nvarchar(?),@P20 nvarchar(?),@P21 nvarchar(?),@P22 nvarchar(?),@P23 nvarchar(?),@P24 nvarchar(?),@P25 nvarchar(?),@P26 nvarchar(?),@P27 nvarchar(?),@P28 nvarchar(?))UPDATE openidmv.ManagedUser SET objectid = @P0, rev = @P1, userModelId = @P2, firstName = @P3, initials = @P4, lastName = @P5, username = @P6, managedInJwaala = @P7, userPassword = @P8, passwordSalt = @P9, email = @P10, jwaalaId = @P11, primaryAccountNumber = @P12, parentAccountNumber = @P13, accountLocked = @P14, accountActive = @P15, inactiveReason = @P16, resetPasswordIndicator = @P17, resetPasswordTime = @P18, created = @P19, createdBy = @P20, modifiedBy = @P21, modified = @P22, devicePrintProfiles = @P23, kbaInfo = @P24, lastSync = @P25, preferences = @P26, idpData = @P27 WHERE objectid = @P28

(@P0 nvarchar(?))WITH results AS ( SELECT rowNo = ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY objectid DESC ), openidmv.ManagedUser.* FROM openidmv.ManagedUser WHERE username = @P0) SELECT * FROM results WHERE rowNo BETWEEN ? AND ?

(@P0 nvarchar(?))select link0_.ID as ID1_3_0_, itemtags2_.ID as ID1_2_1_, link0_.contextItemName as contextI3_3_0_, link0_.name as name4_3_0_, link0_.type as type5_3_0_, link0_.subType as subType6_3_0_, link0_.state as state7_3_0_, link0_.parentItemName as parentIt8_3_0_, link0_.userId as userId9_3_0_, link0_.createdBy as created10_3_0_, link0_.createdTimestamp as created11_3_0_, link0_.lastModifiedBy as lastMod12_3_0_, link0_.lastModifiedTimestamp as lastMod13_3_0_, link0_.lastPublicationTimestamp as lastPub14_3_0_, link0_.uuid as uuid15_3_0_, link0_.lockCounter as lockCou16_3_0_, link0_.hidden as hidden17_3_0_, link0_.manageable as managea18_3_0_, link0_.publicationStatus as publica19_3_0_, link0_.nextPublishAction as nextPub20_3_0_, link0_.page_id as page21_3_0_, link0_.template_id as templat22_3_0_, link0_.extendedItem_id as extende23_3_0_, itemtags2_.blacklist as blacklis2_2_1_, itemtags2_.manageable as manageab3_2_1_, itemtags2_.tag_id as tag4_2_1_, itemtags2_.item_id as item5_3_0__, itemtags2_.ID as ID1_2_0__ from items link0_ left outer join property_definition propertyde1_ on link0_.ID=propertyde1_.item_id left outer join item_tags itemtags2_ on link0_.ID=itemtags2_.item_id where link0_.discriminator=? and link0_.userId=@P0

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 bigint,@P2 bigint)select item0_.ID as ID1_3_0_, propertyde1_.ID as ID1_5_1_, itemtags2_.ID as ID1_2_2_, item0_.contextItemName as contextI3_3_0_, item0_.name as name4_3_0_, item0_.type as type5_3_0_, item0_.subType as subType6_3_0_, item0_.state as state7_3_0_, item0_.parentItemName as parentIt8_3_0_, item0_.userId as userId9_3_0_, item0_.createdBy as created10_3_0_, item0_.createdTimestamp as created11_3_0_, item0_.lastModifiedBy as lastMod12_3_0_, item0_.lastModifiedTimestamp as lastMod13_3_0_, item0_.lastPublicationTimestamp as lastPub14_3_0_, item0_.uuid as uuid15_3_0_, item0_.lockCounter as lockCou16_3_0_, item0_.hidden as hidden17_3_0_, item0_.manageable as managea18_3_0_, item0_.publicationStatus as publica19_3_0_, item0_.nextPublishAction as nextPub20_3_0_, item0_.page_id as page21_3_0_, item0_.template_id as templat22_3_0_, item0_.extendedItem_id as extende23_3_0_, item0_.discriminator as discrimi2_3_0_, propertyde1_.name as name2_5_1_, propertyde1_.label as label3_5_1_, propertyde1_.versioning as versioni4_5_1_, propertyde1_.viewHint as viewHint5_5_1_, propertyde1_.manageable as manageab6_5_1_, propertyde1_.internalValue as internal7_5_1_, propertyde1_.type as type8_5_1_, propertyde1_.item_id as item9_3_0__, propertyde1_.ID as ID1_5_0__, propertyde1_.name as name2_0__, itemtags2_.blacklist as blacklis2_2_2_, itemtags2_.manageable as manageab3_2_2_, itemtags2_.tag_id as tag4_2_2_, itemtags2_.item_id as item5_3_1__, itemtags2_.ID as ID1_2_1__ from items item0_ left outer join property_definition propertyde1_ on item0_.ID=propertyde1_.item_id left outer join item_tags itemtags2_ on item0_.ID=itemtags2_.item_id where item0_.userId=@P0 and (item0_.page_id in (@P1 , @P2)) order by propertyde1_.ID
BACKUP LOG [bb-dbs] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [bb-dbs] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [DbpBackup] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [bb-dbs] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [DbpBackup] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterArchiveGolden] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [DbpBackup] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_orchestr_pre] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_orchestr] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?

/* 
  -- SoSSE 30.0.0.9776
-- File - Procedure\sqlserver_spotlight\2012\SQLFiles.sql
-- *
-- * Copyright 2018 Quest Software Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
-- *
 
*/
SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY -10
set nocount on
set lock_timeout 100
DECLARE
@ErrorMessage NVARCHAR(4000),
@ErrorNumber INT,
@ErrorSeverity INT,
@ErrorState INT,
@ErrorLine INT,
@ErrorProcedure NVARCHAR(200);
BEGIN TRY
use tempdb
DECLARE @FGName nvarchar(128)
SET @FGName = N'%'
if isnull(object_id(N'tempdb..#Quest_sqlfiles'),0)<> 0
begin
drop table #Quest_sqlfiles
 end
CREATE TABLE #Quest_sqlfiles (
 [DBName] [sysname] collate database_default NOT NULL ,
[dbid] [smallint] NOT NULL,
[FileName] [nvarchar] (255) collate database_default NULL ,
[FileID] [int] not NULL ,
[GroupID] [int]not NULL ,
[GroupName] [sysname] collate database_default null,
[Path] [nvarchar] (512) collate database_default NULL ,
[Drive] [nvarchar] (1) collate database_default NULL ,
[Size] [real] NULL ,
[Growth] [int] NULL ,
[MaxSize] [real] NULL ,
[type] [int] NULL,
[is_percent_growth] [bit]NULL,
[TotalKB] [real] null,
[FileUsedKB] [real] null,
[DiskBytes] [real] null,
[DiskTotalBytes] [real] null,
[DiskPath] [nvarchar] (512) collate database_default NULL,
[VolumeID] [nvarchar] (512) collate database_default NULL,
[MaxSizeMB] [real] null,
[MaxSizeValue] [real] null,
[Secondary] [bit] null
)
declare @dbs table (
row int identity,
name sysname
)
declare @rows int
insert into @dbs (name)
select name
from sys.databases with (nolock)
where user_access <> 1 and has_dbaccess(name) <> 0 and state = 0 and is_auto_close_on = 0
set @rows = @@rowcount
declare @DBName sysname
declare @sql nvarchar(2000)
set @sql = ''
set @DBName = ''
while @rows > 0
begin
select @DBName = name from @dbs where row = @rows
if @DBName is null
break
if (select count(1) from sys.master_files smf where smf.is_sparse = 1) > 0
set @sql = N'use '+quotename(@DBName)+ ';
			with vfs(fileid, size) as
			(
				select file_id, sum(size_on_disk_bytes)/1024 from sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(db_id(), null) vvv
					group by vvv.file_id
			)
			select db_name() as DBName, db_id() dbid, rtrim(sf.name),
									sf.file_id, isnull(filegroup_id(sfg.name),0), rtrim(sfg.name), rtrim(smf.physical_name),
									sf.size, sf.growth, sf.max_size, sf.type,sf.is_percent_growth,
									case smf.is_sparse 
										when 1 then vfs.size
										when 0 then convert(bigint,fileproperty(sf.name,''SpaceUsed'')) * 8.0 
									end as [Used],
										vs.available_bytes, vs.total_bytes, vs.volume_mount_point,vs.volume_id
									from sys.database_files sf with (nolock)
									left outer join sys.filegroups sfg with (nolock) on sf.data_space_id   = FILEGROUP_ID(sfg.name)
									inner join sys.master_files smf with (nolock) on smf.database_id = db_id() and smf.file_id = sf.file_id
									outer apply sys.dm_os_volume_stats(db_id(), sf.file_id) vs
									join vfs on vfs.fileid = sf.file_id'
else
set @sql = N'use '+quotename(@DBName)+ ';
			select db_name() as DBName, db_id() dbid, rtrim(sf.name),
									sf.file_id, isnull(filegroup_id(sfg.name),0), rtrim(sfg.name), rtrim(smf.physical_name),
									sf.size, sf.growth, sf.max_size, sf.type,sf.is_percent_growth,
									convert(bigint,fileproperty(sf.name,''SpaceUsed'')) * 8.0 as [Used],
									vs.available_bytes, vs.total_bytes, vs.volume_mount_point,vs.volume_id
									from sys.database_files sf with (nolock)
									left outer join sys.filegroups sfg with (nolock) on sf.data_space_id   = FILEGROUP_ID(sfg.name)
									inner join sys.master_files smf with (nolock) on smf.database_id = db_id() and smf.file_id = sf.file_id
									outer apply sys.dm_os_volume_stats(db_id(), sf.file_id) vs'
begin try
insert into #Quest_sqlfiles
 (DBName, dbid, FileName, FileID, GroupID, GroupName, Path, Size, Growth, MaxSize, type,is_percent_growth,FileUsedKB,DiskBytes,DiskTotalBytes,DiskPath,VolumeID)
exec(@sql)
end try
begin catch
end catch
set @rows = @rows - 1
end
update dsf
set dsf.Size = v.size_on_disk_bytes/(1024*8.0)
from #Quest_sqlfiles	dsf
 join sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null,null) v
on dsf.dbid = v.database_id
and dsf.FileID = v.file_id
join sys.databases d with (nolock)
on dsf.dbid = d.database_id
where d.source_database_id is NULL -- non a database snapshot

update dsf
set dsf.Secondary = case role when 2 then 1 else 0 end
from #Quest_sqlfiles	dsf
 join sys.databases d with (nolock) on dsf.dbid = d.database_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.dm_hadr_availability_replica_states hars ON d.replica_id = hars.replica_id
--update to totals for log files that missed out in the join in the above query
 update
#Quest_sqlfiles
 set
TotalKB = (8.0*Size)
where
TotalKB is null;
with Counters(counter_name, dbName, value) as
(
SELECT counter_name, instance_name, cntr_value
FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters pc with (nolock)
WHERE counter_name IN ('Log File(s) Size (KB)', 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)')
AND instance_name != '_Total'
)
update dsf
set dsf.FileUsedKB = dsf.TotalKB*(logs.LogSpaceUsedPercent/100)
from #Quest_sqlfiles dsf
 inner join (SELECT
size.dbName as dbName,
CASE size.value
WHEN 0 THEN 0
ELSE 100 * convert(real, used.value) / convert(real, size.value)
END as LogSpaceUsedPercent
FROM Counters size
join Counters used on size.dbName = used.dbName and used.counter_name = 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)'
where size.counter_name = 'Log File(s) Size (KB)') logs on logs.dbName = dsf.DBName
where dsf.GroupID = 0;
update #Quest_sqlfiles set GroupName = N'<Log>' where GroupName is null
 update #Quest_sqlfiles set MaxSizeValue = case 
 when (Growth = 0) then convert(decimal(16,2),TotalKB/1024.0)
when (MaxSize=-1) then -1
else convert(decimal(16,2),MaxSize/128.0)
end
update #Quest_sqlfiles set MaxSizeMB = DiskBytes / 1024.0 / 1024 

update #Quest_sqlfiles set MaxSizeMB = case 
 when (MaxSizeValue > 0) then
case when (Case when (MaxSizeValue > TotalKB / 1024) then MaxSizeValue else TotalKB / 1024.0 end - TotalKB / 1024.0) < DiskBytes / 1024.0 / 1024
then Case when (MaxSizeValue > TotalKB / 1024) then MaxSizeValue else TotalKB / 1024.0 end - TotalKB / 1024.0
else DiskBytes / 1024 / 1024.0
end
else
DiskBytes / 1024.0 / 1024
end
set nocount off
select
DBName + '.' + FileName as N'DBAndFile',
dbid as N'DBId',
DBName as N'DBName',
FileName as N'File',
GroupName as N'FileGroup',
DBName + '.' + GroupName as N'DBAndFileGroup',
DiskBytes / 1024.0 as N'diskfreekb',
DiskBytes / 1024 / 1024.0 as N'diskfreemb',
DiskTotalBytes / 1024.0 as N'DiskTotalKb',
DiskTotalBytes / 1024 / 1024.0 as N'DiskTotalmb',
case
when right(DiskPath,1) = '\' then substring(DiskPath, 1, len(DiskPath)-1)
			else DiskPath
		end							as DiskPath,
		case
			when (type = 1) then N'Log' 
 			when (type = 2) then 'Filestream'
			else N'Data'
		end							as N'Type',
		TotalKB						as N'TotalKB',
		TotalKB	/ 1024.0				as N'TotalMB',
		case
			when (Growth = 0) then N'No'
			else N'Yes'
		end							as N'AutoGrow',
		case
			when (Growth = 0) then convert(nvarchar(32), convert(decimal(16,2),TotalKB/1024.0) ) + N' MB'
			when (MaxSize=-1) then N'Unlimited'
			when (MaxSize=268435456 and type = 1) then N'2 TB'
			else convert(nvarchar(32), convert(decimal(16,2),MaxSize/128.0) ) + N' MB'
		end							as N'MaxSize',
		MaxSizeValue				as N'MaxSizeValue',
		case
			when (is_percent_growth = 1) then convert(nvarchar(32), Growth) + N'%'
			else convert(nvarchar(32), convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/128.0) ) + N' MB'
		end							as N'GrowthIncrement',
		case
			when (is_percent_growth = 1) then 1 else 0
		end							as N'GrowthByPct',
		case
			when (is_percent_growth = 1) then convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/100.0)
			else convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/128.0)
		end							as N'GrowthIncrementValue',
		Path						as N'Path',
		FileUsedKB					as N'FileUsedKB',
		FileUsedKB / 1024			as N'FileUsedMB',
		MaxSizeMB					as N'MaxSizeMB',
		case
			when (Growth = 0) then 0.0
			when (TotalKB <= 0) then 999999999
			when (is_percent_growth = 1) then FLOOR(LOG10((MaxSizeMB + (TotalKB / 1024)) / (TotalKB / 1024)) / LOG10(1 + convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/100.0)))
				  else MaxSizeMB / convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/128.0)
		end as N'DynamicGrowthsRemaining',
		case
			when (Growth = 0) then TotalKB / 1024
			when (TotalKB <= 0) then MaxSizeMB
			when (is_percent_growth = 1) then TotalKB * POWER(1 + convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/100.0),FLOOR(LOG10((MaxSizeMB + (TotalKB / 1024.0)) / (TotalKB / 1024.0)) / LOG10(1 + convert(decimal(16,2),convert(real,Growth)/100.0)))) / 1024.0
				  else (TotalKB / 1024.0) + FLOOR(MaxSizeMB)
		end as N'MaxGrowthAvailable',
		TotalKB - FileUsedKB as N'FileFreeKB',
		(TotalKB - FileUsedKB) / 1024.0 as N'FileFreeMB',
		case when (TotalKB <= 0) then 
			NULL 
		else
			 100 * (TotalKB - FileUsedKB) / TotalKB
		end as N'FileFreePct',
		case when (TotalKB <= 0) then 
			NULL 
		else
			100 * FileUsedKB / TotalKB 
		end as N'FileUsedPct',
		case when type = 1 then -- log
			-1 
		else
			case when (TotalKB <= 0) then 
				NULL 
			else
				100 * FileUsedKB / TotalKB 
			end 
		end as N'FixedDataUsed',
		case when type = 1 then -- log
			case when (TotalKB <= 0) then 
				NULL 
			else	
				100 * FileUsedKB / TotalKB 
			end
		else 
			-1 
		end as N'FixedLogUsed',
		1 as N'FileInfoAvailable',
		case when Secondary = 1 then 1 else 0 end as 'Secondary',
		DiskPath 						as MountPointAsDiskPath,
		VolumeID
	from #Quest_sqlfiles
	where
		GroupName like @FGName
	order by DBAndFile

	DROP TABLE #Quest_sqlfiles

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
    SELECT
        @ErrorNumber = ERROR_NUMBER(),
        @ErrorSeverity = ERROR_SEVERITY(),
        @ErrorState = ERROR_STATE(),
        @ErrorLine = ERROR_LINE(),
        @ErrorProcedure = ISNULL(ERROR_PROCEDURE(), '-');

    SELECT @ErrorMessage = N'Error %d, Level %d, State %d, Procedure %s, Line %d, Message: '+ ERROR_MESSAGE();
    IF @ErrorNumber != 1205 and @ErrorNumber != 1222
    BEGIN
        set lock_timeout -1
        if @ErrorSeverity > 18
            RAISERROR(@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, 1, @ErrorNumber, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState, @ErrorProcedure,@ErrorLine) WITH LOG;
        else
            RAISERROR(@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, 1, @ErrorNumber, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState, @ErrorProcedure,@ErrorLine);
    END
END CATCH

set lock_timeout -1
BACKUP LOG [cxp_orchestr_pre] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [DbpBackup] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_orchestr] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterArchiveGolden] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
IF @@TRANCOUNT > ? COMMIT TRAN set implicit_transactions off
BACKUP LOG [bb-dbs] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterArchiveGolden] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
set transaction isolation level read committed

(@P0 int,@P1 nvarchar(?))select TOP(@P0) batchitem0_.id as id1_0_, batchitem0_.account_id as account_2_0_, batchitem0_.batch_started as batch_st3_0_, batchitem0_.batch_status as batch_st4_0_, batchitem0_.worker_type as worker_t5_0_, batchitem0_.created_date as created_6_0_, batchitem0_.error_count as error_co7_0_, batchitem0_.external_arrangement_id as external8_0_, batchitem0_.internal_arrangement_id as internal9_0_, batchitem0_.last_indexed_date as last_in10_0_, batchitem0_.last_indexed_locator as last_in11_0_, batchitem0_.last_processed as last_pr12_0_, batchitem0_.logged_in_priority as logged_13_0_, batchitem0_.mx_account_id as mx_acco14_0_, batchitem0_.mx_enabled as mx_enab15_0_, batchitem0_.mx_indexed as mx_inde16_0_, batchitem0_.version as version17_0_, batchitem0_.worker_id as worker_18_0_ from batch_item batchitem0_ where batchitem0_.batch_status=@P1 and (batchitem0_.worker_id is null) order by batchitem0_.error_count asc, batchitem0_.created_date asc

(@P0 int,@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 bit,@P3 bit)select TOP(@P0) batchitem0_.id as id1_0_, batchitem0_.account_id as account_2_0_, batchitem0_.batch_started as batch_st3_0_, batchitem0_.batch_status as batch_st4_0_, batchitem0_.worker_type as worker_t5_0_, batchitem0_.created_date as created_6_0_, batchitem0_.error_count as error_co7_0_, batchitem0_.external_arrangement_id as external8_0_, batchitem0_.internal_arrangement_id as internal9_0_, batchitem0_.last_indexed_date as last_in10_0_, batchitem0_.last_indexed_locator as last_in11_0_, batchitem0_.last_processed as last_pr12_0_, batchitem0_.logged_in_priority as logged_13_0_, batchitem0_.mx_account_id as mx_acco14_0_, batchitem0_.mx_enabled as mx_enab15_0_, batchitem0_.mx_indexed as mx_inde16_0_, batchitem0_.version as version17_0_, batchitem0_.worker_id as worker_18_0_ from batch_item batchitem0_ where batchitem0_.batch_status=@P1 and (batchitem0_.worker_id is null) and batchitem0_.mx_indexed=@P2 and batchitem0_.mx_enabled=@P3 order by batchitem0_.error_count asc, batchitem0_.last_processed asc
BACKUP LOG [cxp_portal_pre] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_portal_pre] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterArchiveGolden] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterManagement] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [bb-dbs] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_content] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_tracking] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_portal] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterManagement] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_tracking] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [activemq] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [ImageCenterArchive] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?
BACKUP LOG [cxp_orchestr_live] TO VIRTUAL_DEVICE=?

(@handles nvarchar(?))/* 
  -- SoSSE 30.0.0.9776
-- File - Procedure\sqlserver_spotlight\2008\LookupSQLText.sql
-- *
-- * Copyright 2018 Quest Software Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
-- *
 
*/
SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF
use tempdb
declare @h nvarchar(?)
declare @handlesVar nvarchar(max);
declare @text nvarchar(max);
/* uncomment this for testing
set statistics io on
set statistics time on
declare @handles nvarchar(max)
set @handles = '';
select @handles = @handles + convert(nvarchar(max), er.plan_handle, 1) + ',' from sys.dm_exec_requests er with (nolock)
 where er.plan_handle is not null 

 set @handles=substring(@handles, 1, len(@handles)-1)
 -- */
if len(@handles) = ?
return;
declare @handlesTable table
(
sqlHandle varbinary(?)
)
set @handlesVar = @handles
declare @start int
declare @end int
set @start = ?
set @end = ?
while @end > ?
begin
set @end = charindex(?, @handlesVar, @start)
if @end = ?
set @h = substring(@handlesVar, @start, len(@handlesVar) - @start + ?)
else
set @h = substring(@handlesVar, @start, @end - @start)
if lower(substring(@h, ?, ?)) != ?
set @h = ? + @h;
set @start = @end+?
insert into @handlesTable
select CONVERT(varbinary(?), @h, ?)
end
select sqlHandle, sq.text as sqlText from @handlesTable
outer apply sys.dm_exec_sql_text(sqlHandle) as sq
use [ImageCenterArchive]; select file_id, type, name, physical_name, state, size from sys.database_files where (state = ?); use master

(@P0 nvarchar(?),@P1 nvarchar(?))SELECT obj.* FROM openidmv.schedulerobjects obj INNER JOIN openidmv.objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id AND objtype.objecttype = @P0 WHERE obj.objectid = @P1

(@P0 int,@P1 nvarchar(?),@P2 bit)select TOP(@P0) batchitem0_.id as id1_0_, batchitem0_.account_id as account_2_0_, batchitem0_.batch_started as batch_st3_0_, batchitem0_.batch_status as batch_st4_0_, batchitem0_.worker_type as worker_t5_0_, batchitem0_.created_date as created_6_0_, batchitem0_.error_count as error_co7_0_, batchitem0_.external_arrangement_id as external8_0_, batchitem0_.internal_arrangement_id as internal9_0_, batchitem0_.last_indexed_date as last_in10_0_, batchitem0_.last_indexed_locator as last_in11_0_, batchitem0_.last_processed as last_pr12_0_, batchitem0_.logged_in_priority as logged_13_0_, batchitem0_.mx_account_id as mx_acco14_0_, batchitem0_.mx_enabled as mx_enab15_0_, batchitem0_.mx_indexed as mx_inde16_0_, batchitem0_.version as version17_0_, batchitem0_.worker_id as worker_18_0_ from batch_item batchitem0_ where batchitem0_.batch_status=@P1 and (batchitem0_.worker_id is null) and batchitem0_.logged_in_priority=@P2 order by batchitem0_.error_count asc, batchitem0_.last_processed asc
USE [OpenIDMV]; select class, name, value from sys.extended_properties; USE [master];
use [cxp_portal_live]; select sum(size) from sys.database_files ; use master
(@P0 bigint)update TB_NODES set HEARTBEAT=current_timestamp where node_id=@P0

use [ImageCenterArchive] select db_id() dbid, rtrim(sf.physical_name), rtrim(sf.name),
sf.file_id, isnull(filegroup_id(sfg.name),?),
isnull(rtrim(sfg.name),?) GroupName,
sf.type_desc from sys.database_files sf with (nolock) left outer join sys.filegroups sfg with (nolock) on sf.data_space_id = FILEGROUP_ID(sfg.name)
